remarks: Ordered power series form a ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Mar-2015.)
statement:
opsrring.o $e |- O = ( ( I ordPwSer R ) ` T ) $.
opsrring.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
opsrring.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
opsrring.t $e |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) $.
opsrring $p |- ( ph -> O e. Ring ) $.
